# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its worth to you, we propose an offer that reflects its true value while considering your budget. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at a special price of $13,500. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $13,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $13,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
